headline: Court approves fire sale of most of Rite Aid's pharmacy assets
summary: Bankrupt Rite Aid onWednesday received court approval to close stores and sell mostof its pharmacy assets in separate transactions to CVS,Walgreens, Albertsons, Kroger and Giant Eagle, among...

headline: Here Are 3 American Companies on Warren Buffett's Balance Sheet. Are They a Buy?
summary: Recently raised import and export tariffs are putting a premium on stocks of companies that can sidestep these rising costs.
